name: Boston
tagline: is a tool for exploring historic urban atlases in metropolitan Boston and telling stories about how places have changed over time
institutionalCredit: A project of the [Leventhal Map & Education Center at the Boston Public Library](https://www.leventhalmap.org)

outOfBoundsMessage.text: Help us extend the coverage in Atlascope by sponsoring an atlas
